title: Square, ca. 1930
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: satin, stem, and couching stitches on plain weave (couching thread making the pattern); running stitches with very long float and short tie down with a short overhand or stem stitch covering the tie down point
description: Tan square with a floral scroll in each corner, each connected by a floral vine in multi-colored thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Square, ca. 1930.Medium: silk on linen
Technique: satin, stem, and couching stitches on plain weave (couching thread making the pattern); running stitches with very long float and short tie down with a short overhand or stem stitch covering the tie down point. 1979-66-19.
